title: Harlem Nights T-Shirt Font
content:
Hi! I'm trying to figure out what font may have been used on the Harlem Nights shirts in this picture. I apologize for the low res sample, it's the highest one I can find.

I'm betting it's been modified some but if I could find a starting point it would be wonderful. Thank you!

Font: 

 Elegant 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113929/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [harlem.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113929/http:/typophile.com/files/harlem.jpg) | 65.84 KB |
author: plantholiday

comments.content: It must be **[Elegant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113929/http:/fontsfordesign.com/preview.html)** (or **Elegant Inline** ) from Douglas F. Olena / Keystrokes
Amazing. Thank you! Marked this as solved.
